name: webassembly-boilerplate
description: WebAssembly with AssemblyScript, TypeScript, and React

scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/wasm && npm run build -w packages/react
scripts.build:debug: npm run build:debug -w packages/wasm && npm run build:debug -w packages/react
scripts.build:release: npm run build:release -w packages/wasm && npm run build:release -w packages/react
scripts.serve: npm run build:debug -w packages/wasm && workspaces-run --parallel --only="webassembly-boilerplate-{wasm,react}" -- npm run serve
